Class AdminController

java.lang.Object
com.group18.controller.admin.AdminController
public class AdminController extends Object
The AdminController class serves as the main controller for the admin dashboard in the application. It manages the primary layout and switches the content in the central area of the screen depending on user interactions.

  • Field Summary

  • Field Details

    • root

      private javafx.scene.layout.BorderPane root
      Represents the root layout of the admin dashboard, specifically a BorderPane that serves as the main container for different content areas within the admin view. The root pane organizes the overall UI, with sections for a menu, central content, and other components. The central content area is dynamically switched based on user interactions.

    • content

      private javafx.scene.Node content
      Represents the dynamically loadable content to be displayed in the central area of the admin dashboard. This field is used together with the BorderPane layout to switch views in the application based on user interactions.

    • sidebarController

      private AdminSidebarController sidebarController
      References the AdminSidebarController instance associated with this controller. The sidebarController is responsible for managing the admin sidebar's behavior, such as handling user interactions with sidebar buttons, updating user-related information, and communicating with the main AdminController. This variable is injected using the @FXML annotation and is initialized during the loading of the FXML file. The `setMainController` method is called to establish a link between this controller and the AdminSidebarController, ensuring proper interaction between the sidebar and main admin control logic.

  • Constructor Details

    • AdminController

      public AdminController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      private void initialize()
      Initializes the main controller by setting itself as the main controller for the associated sidebar controller. This method is automatically called by the JavaFX framework during the view's initialization phase.

    • switchContent

      public void switchContent(String fxmlPath)
      Switches the content displayed in the central area of the admin dashboard. Loads the FXML file specified by the given path and updates the UI accordingly.
      Parameters:
      fxmlPath - The path to the FXML file to load and display in the central area.
